News • Games

Developers of Elder Scrolls are working on new games

By John Doe • Aug 19, 2021 • 1 comment

Bethesda Softworks, the studio behind the Elder Scrolls and Fallout games, have announced that they are working on a new game called Starfield. The game is being developed for multiple platforms, but no specific platforms have been specified. It's being developed by the Austin, Texas branch of Bethesda Game Studios, which has developed all Fallout games so far.

Starfield is set in space and gamers will be able to explore different planets. The game is expected to launch in the year 2027. It also reveals that Todd Howard, the game director at Bethesda has planned to work with other developers on the upcoming Starfield. The game's description reads, "Starfield is an open-world space saga that will transport you across an epic galaxy filled with mystery and intrigue. Your journey will be guided by the pilot who flies through space."

Starfield is Bethesda's next big blockbuster and will be yet another RPG. The E3 trailer shows a huge space station and a planet. Maybe there will be a variety of different planets that the player can explore. Maybe each planet will have a unique environment not seen anywhere else in the game. We might see a planet with a harsh environment with lava, acid, etc. would have a few unique monsters not seen on other planets. The player may have to deal with monsters which are resistant to their weapons.

We will be covering everything about Starfield here at Gamify. Stay tuned for updates!

It's everything that the original was, but with upgrades that are just amazing. It's so fun, and it is so much different than what I was expecting.
